casebody.data:
WORLEY, et al.
v.
MOORE, et al. 310A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 31, 2016 *261Adam H. Charnes, Attorney at Law, John M. Moye, Attorney at Law, for Moore, Roy J., et al. R. Daniel Boyce, Attorney at Law, Thomas J. Ludlam, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Worley, Dennis, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of October 2016 by Defendants to File Corrected Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of October 2016." Ervin, J. recused
